title: League of legends youtube video copyrights
body:
I've read through the Legal Jibber Jabber but, i am still confused on weither or not it is legal for me to post videos on youtube with or without a youtube partnership. if it is illegal i would like to know how i can upload to youtube with out any copyright strikes before and after i become a youtube partner.
... i guess what i'm trying to ask is can i upload to youtube and be able to be a youtube partner making money off of the video(s) i post.

replies.body:
ill answer this for you since riot would never give you a straight answer in order to keep their options open

so if your channel is monetized it is against the EULA for you to post any content without permission from riot games however nothing will happen so long as your video doesnt portray the game in a negative light, and it works that way because riot openly practices discrimination rather then doing what the law says and making 1 rule for everyone and sticking to it.
thank you wargumby dont think ill ever portray this game in a negative way since i love it so much

I'm not part of the legal team, so I can't really speak for what would be okay beyond the legal jibber jabber guide.  Hit us up directly via info@riotgames.com, and we'll make sure your question is fielded to the proper team.  Hang tight!
I just realized how inept i am at attempting to contact you at riot games considering all that i do takes me to the riot homepage and i cant navigate to where i need to be to contact riot properly.
